description: This peasant woman sprouts a grotesquely long neck that coils about like a snake, with razor-sharp teeth filling her gaping maw.

sections.name: Elongate Neck
sections.text: A rokurokubi can stretch her neck from a normal human length up to 20 feet, giving her reach with her bite attack and threatening all squares within that range.

sections.name: Nightfall Aura
sections.text: A rokurokubi can create an aura of darkness and silence (CL 12th) with a radius of 15 feet. The rokurokubi is immune to the effects of her aura, and can activate or suppress this ability as a free action. These aura effects can be dispelled as if they were spells.

sections.name: No Sleep
sections.text: A rokurokubi does not need to sleep and is immune to all sleep effects.

sections.name: Rokurokubi's Curse
sections.text: Bite—injury; save Will DC 23; frequency 1 day; effect 1 Cha damage and permanently silenced after 4 Cha damage. Fully healing the Cha damage cures the silence. The save DC is Charisma-based.

sections.name: Spells
sections.text: A rokurokubi casts spells as a 12th-level sorcerer.

A rokurokubi is an evil hag-like creature who seeks to spread as much mayhem and despair as possible. Her skin ranges in hue from pale blue to muted green, so to disguise herself she must cover up her flesh with makeup and clothing, and retract her neck so it is no longer than a human's.

A rokurokubi can mate with almost any male humanoid, monstrous humanoid, or humanoid-shaped creature. Her offspring is always a rokurokubi. The mate is usually devoured once the rokurokubi tires of his presence.

name: Rokurokubi
skills: Bluff +26, Climb +24, Disguise +26, Intimidate +25, Perception +21, Stealth +26
